Loshe

Location
The Dry Dock
Loyalty
15

Loshe is a remarkable figure on The Dream, serving as the dockmaster responsible for overseeing all incoming and outgoing ships. His distinctive appearance, with an exoskeleton that gives him two extra arms, is matched by his demeanor. Loshe is renowned for his ability to stay cool under pressure, even in the midst of the frenetic activity that characterizes life on The Dream.

Because of his responsibilities as dockmaster, Loshe has become a trusted source of information about life on The Dream. His meticulous attention to detail has made him a valuable asset to many of the crew members and travelers who call the Dream home.
